meanings.definition: To sharpen (a razor or other cutting tool) on a strop.
meanings.sent1: I always strop my knife before going camping.
meanings.sent2: She strops the scissors to ensure they are always sharp.
meanings.sent3: The chef strops the knives while singing a tune.
meanings.sent4: He strops the blade with precision, like an artist with a brush.
meanings.sent5: Stropping the blade is essential for a clean cut.

meanings.sent1: She tends to strop when things don't go her way.
meanings.sent2: The child began to strop after dropping his ice cream.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to strop when it saw the closed door.
meanings.sent4: His face started to strop, showing his frustration.
meanings.sent5: Don't strop over small things; stay calm and carry on.
